sentence: Craig is the current frontrunner in the Republican primary, but the primary field is packed with other candidates, including chiropractor Garrett Soldano, businessman Perry Johnson, real estate broker and activist Ryan Kelley, conservative commentator Tudor Dixon, and former car dealership owner Kevin Rinke.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Poll: Michigan Democrat Gretchen Whitmer Trails Republican on Generic Ballot for Governor's Race

sentence: The Court of Claims decision mirrors Wednesday rulings from the Michigan Court of Appeals, which denied similar appeals from GOP gubernatorial hopefuls Oakland County businessman Perry Johnson and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey.
author: Arpan Lobo
title: James Craig loses bid to appear on primary ballot after Michigan court denies appeal
